Default Variables Page

Customize your cleaning preferences for different CSV file types

Default Variables Overview

This page controls the default columns to be cleaned when a CSV file is imported. Users don't need to manually select these columns every time they import the same type of CSV files.

The Default Variables page serves as your central hub for managing cleaning presets, saving you time on repetitive tasks.

Included Columns Management

Easily specify which columns should always be included in your cleaned files. The interface provides:

  • Clear visual indicators for included columns
  • Quick toggle options for each column
  • Bulk selection capabilities
  • Column preview to verify your selections

Adding New Columns

Expand your cleaning presets by adding new columns to your default variables:

  • Simple one-click addition of columns

History Page (Only for Windows)

Track and manage all your imported and cleaned files

File History Tracking

The History page is organized into two convenient tabs for easy navigation between your imported and cleaned files.

File Management Options

Right-click on any file to access powerful context-sensitive options:

  • Open directly
  • Download or Save As file
